lines.text: There is no shelter from the bomb in a shelter.
All those people will be buried alive, it'll be just like the Holocaust.
It doesn't really matter what my name is.
I don't remember. I don't *want* to remember.
The manual says we couldn't go outside to bury them, so the corpses would have to be stored here in these bags.
How may of these things are there?
what's the last corpse supposed to do? Jump into one of these things and zip himself up?
